entry.title: Fruit of the Loom Polo Shirts
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: T-Shirt
Price: 3.00

Gildan Adult Ultra Cotton® 10 oz./lin. yd. T-Shirt

Fabric:

  • 6 oz., 100% preshrunk cotton
  • Ash Grey is 99/1; Sport Grey is 90/10
  • Antique colors are 90/10
  • Heathers and Safety colors are 50/50


Features:

  • Tear away label
  • Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
  • Seamless double-needle 7/8" collar
  • Taped neck and shoulders
  • Safety Green is compliant with ANSI / ISEA 107 high visibility standards


Sizes: S-5XL

entry.title: Fruit of the Loom Ladies' 8.3 oz./lin. yd. HD Cotton™ V-Neck T-Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: T-Shirt
Price: 4.00

Fruit of the Loom Ladies' 8.3 oz./lin. yd. HD Cotton™ V-Neck T-Shirt

Features:

  • 100% cotton preshrunk jersey
  • high-density fabric for exceptional print clarity
  • 1x1 rib set-in collar with mitered V-neck construction
  • should-to-shoulder taping; sideseamed & slightly contoured for a flattering fit
  • double-needle coverstitching on sleeve and bottom hem
  • Athletic Heather is 90% cotton, 10% polyester
  • classic ladies' styling with feminine neckline, sleeves and fit

Sizes: S-2XL
